column1: Smoque BBQ////I got the pulled pork sandwich with a side of BBQ beans. Everything was out of this world. My girlfriend ordered the BBQ brisket sandwich and she also loved hers. They give you a HUGE cup of BBQ sauce on the side that is so good I could drink it. (LOL!) It's definitely a walk-up order and sit down place
column2: but they're so busy that they actually have someone actively standing in the restaurant to clean the tables off and escort guests to their seats. Amazing place!
